Did you know you can change your status? Change your status to let others know if you are away or maybe even busy!
Chat cluttered up? clear it in settings!
Did you know that the entirety of NihChat is open-sourced? check out the source by pressing the button below settings!
Want to see the online list at all times? well then pin it!
Set a custom text status using settings!
Hold `shift + Enter` to send multiple paragraphs!
Search for suitable emojis by using ':' as prefix!
Want to turn off autologin? Do it in settings!
want to instantly login? check the box that says 'login instantly' in the login page and let NihChat save a few clicks for you!
